titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry star Jack Green at the Roman Forum

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing the Grand Ole Opry stars Jack Greene and Jeanne Seely at the Roman Forum on March 16. Poster features metal photoplates of Jack Greene and Jeannie Seely and the Jolly Giants.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
